note: Perennially bad tempered, mixed race, anarchocommunist, vegan, queer, non-binary, trade-unionist, prison abolitionist. Twitter escapee and veteran of many crap bands. Friendly but not very sociable. Neurodivergent of some description. Into stuff like books, trad/folk music, sean nós, uilleann pipes, politics, history, gardening, learning Irish. Also a (v bad) writer. Views entirely my own (but happy to share). Labhair liom as Gaeilge! #Antifa #Gaeilge #Mastindia #Mastodaoine 🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧🅾️🇵🇸🫖

fields.name: Pronouns
fields.value: they/them/thon/that melter (and, entirely without irony, comrade)

fields.name: Content
fields.value: if you post in Irish and/or a lot of dog pics i am very likely to follow you

fields.name: Ón abhainn go dtí an fharraige
